Title: Relates to expanding the residential parking permit system within the area known as Elmont in the town of Hempstead
Summary: Expands the residential parking permit system within the area known as Elmont in the town of Hempstead to include all of Sussex Road.
LawCode: Amd ยง1662-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to expanding the residential parking permit system within the area known as Elmont in the town of Hempstead
